doc.field: This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided to the UVA Library’s Scholars’ Lab by the Virginia Base Mapping Program (Virginia Geographic Information Network, Department of Information Technology), and is provided AS-IS with no guarantees as regards to its accuracy or temporal currency. It pertains to the locations and resolution of full-color leaf-off digital orthoimagery within the state of Virginia. * // * The temporal extent of the datasets in the datastack is for the years 2002-2007 . * // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack (with non-exclusive list of included attributes): * vgin_tile_100_north - includes grid and file path for 6 in resolution orthoimagery in State Plane VA North * vgin_tile_100_south includes grid and file path for 6 in resolution orthoimagery in State Plane VA South * vgin_tile_200_north includes grid and file path for 1 ft resolution orthoimagery in State Plane VA North * vgin_tile_200_south includes grid and file path for 1ft resolution orthoimagery in State Plane VA South * vgin_tile_400_north includes grid and file path for 2 ft resolution orthoimagery in State Plane VA North * vgin_tile_400_south includes grid and file path for 2 ft resolution orthoimagery in State Plane VA South * * // * These data were made available to the University of Virginia for educational and research uses only. Access is restricted to students, faculty and staff of the University of Virginia.
